name: Horror movie right there on my TV
description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song 'Horror Movie' helped propel them to number one, making it their biggest hit.

key_work.title: Horror Movie – Skyhooks
key_work.brief_description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song ‘Horror Movie’ (1974) helped mark Australian television’s transition from black and white to colour as it was first played on a special, midnight episode of Countdown (1974–87).

constellations_primary.name: Horror movie right there on my TV
constellations_primary.description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song 'Horror Movie' helped propel them to number one, making it their biggest hit.

constellations_other.name: The secret life of suburbia and music videos
constellations_other.description: Australia's famous streets and suburbs have defined music videos, TV shows and miniseries, providing a unique backdrop to Australian stories and music.

start.title: Horror Movie – Skyhooks
start.brief_description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song ‘Horror Movie’ (1974) helped mark Australian television’s transition from black and white to colour as it was first played on a special, midnight episode of Countdown (1974–87).

end.title: Elvira, Mistress of the Dark
end.creator_credit: James Signorelli, Cassandra Peterson, John Paragon, Sam Egan, Eric Gardner, Mark Pierson, NBC Productions and New World Pictures
end.brief_description: When her great aunt dies, famed horror hostess Elvira heads for the uptight new England town of Falwell to claim her inheritance of a haunted house, a witch’s cookbook and a punk rock poodle. But once the stuffy locals get an eyeful of the scream queen’s ample assets, all hell busts out & breaks loose.

constellations_other.name: Horror movie right there on my TV
constellations_other.description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song 'Horror Movie' helped propel them to number one, making it their biggest hit.

links.description: Although the song was a political commentary on the state of current affairs at the time, ‘Horror Movie’ by Skyhooks became an unintentional Halloween classic after it was included on Elvira: Mistress of the Dark actress Cassandra Petersen’s compilation album Haunted Hits.

start.title: Beavis and Butt-head
start.creator_credit: Mike Judge, Film Roman Productions, J.J. Sedelmaier Productions, Judgemental Films Inc., MTV Animation, Paramount Television Studios, Tenth Annual Industries and Ternion Pictures
start.brief_description: Beavis and Butt-head are high school students whose lifestyles revolve around TV, junk food (usually nachos), shopping malls, heavy metal music, and trying to “score with chicks”. Each show contains short cartoons centering on the duo who live in the fictitious town of Highland, Texas. The episodes are broken up by short breaks in which Beavis and Butt-head watch and make fun of music videos.

constellations_other.name: Horror movie right there on my TV
constellations_other.description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song 'Horror Movie' helped propel them to number one, making it their biggest hit.

end.title: Spy Kids
end.creator_credit: Robert Rodriguez, Deborah Everton, Elizabeth Avellan, Dimension Films, Miramax, Troublemaker Studios and Cary White
end.brief_description: Carmen and Juni think their parents are boring. Little do they know that in their day, Gregorio and Ingrid Cortez were the top secret agents from their respective countries. They gave up that life to raise their children. Now, the disappearances of several of their old colleagues forces the Cortez’ return from retirement. What they didn’t count on was Carmen and Juni joining the “family business.”

constellations_other.name: Horror movie right there on my TV
constellations_other.description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song 'Horror Movie' helped propel them to number one, making it their biggest hit.

links.description: A seminal 90s TV series, Beavis and Butt-Head (1993–2011) was the brainchild of Mike Judge who not only created, wrote and directed the show, he voiced the two central characters. He appeared as Donnagon in Spy Kids.

start.title: Elvira, Mistress of the Dark
start.creator_credit: James Signorelli, Cassandra Peterson, John Paragon, Sam Egan, Eric Gardner, Mark Pierson, NBC Productions and New World Pictures

But once the stuffy locals get an eyeful of the scream queen’s ample assets, all hell busts out & breaks loose.

end.title: I Was a Teenage Werewolf
end.creator_credit: Gene Fowler Jr., Herman Cohen, American International Pictures, Sunset Productions, A. Leslie Thomas and Aben Kandel
end.brief_description: A hypnotherapist uses a temperamental teenager as a guinea pig for a serum which transforms him into a vicious werewolf.

constellations_other.name: Horror movie right there on my TV
constellations_other.description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song 'Horror Movie' helped propel them to number one, making it their biggest hit.

links.description: To coincide with the release of Elvira: Mistress of the Dark, Elvira started releasing compilation albums with songs that would go on to become Halloween staples – like ‘Horror Movie’ and a song by The Cramps named after the film I Was a Teenage Werewolf

start.title: I Was a Teenage Werewolf
start.creator_credit: Gene Fowler Jr., Herman Cohen, American International Pictures, Sunset Productions, A. Leslie Thomas and Aben Kandel
start.brief_description: A hypnotherapist uses a temperamental teenager as a guinea pig for a serum which transforms him into a vicious werewolf.

end.title: Clueless
end.creator_credit: Amy Heckerling, Adam Schroeder, Mona May, Robert Lawrence, Scott Rudin, Paramount Pictures and Steven J. Jordan
end.brief_description: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school’s pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other. Emboldened by her success, she decides to give hopelessly klutzy new student Tai a makeover.

constellations_other.name: Horror movie right there on my TV
constellations_other.description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song 'Horror Movie' helped propel them to number one, making it their biggest hit.

links.description: The 1950s cult horror film I Was a Teenage Werewolf kickstarted an entire trend of genre films that featured ‘teenage’ in the title, which continued right up until the 90s. The original title of Clueless was I Was A Teenage Teenager.

start.title: Clueless
start.creator_credit: Amy Heckerling, Adam Schroeder, Mona May, Robert Lawrence, Scott Rudin, Paramount Pictures and Steven J. Jordan
start.brief_description: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school’s pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other. Emboldened by her success, she decides to give hopelessly klutzy new student Tai a makeover.

end.brief_description: Beavis and Butt-head are high school students whose lifestyles revolve around TV, junk food (usually nachos), shopping malls, heavy metal music, and trying to “score with chicks”. Each show contains short cartoons centering on the duo who live in the fictitious town of Highland, Texas. The episodes are broken up by short breaks in which Beavis and Butt-head watch and make fun of music videos.

constellations_other.name: Horror movie right there on my TV
constellations_other.description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song 'Horror Movie' helped propel them to number one, making it their biggest hit.

links.description: The teen classic Clueless was a remake of Jane Austen’s novel Emma. Set in the 90s and examining key pop cultural moments from the decade, characters watch episodes of Beavis and Butt-Head in the film.

What they didn’t count on was Carmen and Juni joining the “family business.”

end.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
end.creator_credit: Robert Rodriguez, Graciela Mazón, Carlos Gallardo, Elizabeth Avellan, Columbia Pictures, Dimension Films, Sony Pictures and Troublemaker Studios

video_links.name: ONCE UPON A TIME IN MEXICO (2003) – Official Trailer

end.brief_description: Hitman “El Mariachi” becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

constellations_other.name: Horror movie right there on my TV
constellations_other.description: The colourful and quirky music video for Skyhooks’ song 'Horror Movie' helped propel them to number one, making it their biggest hit.

links.description: Mike Judge played Donnagon in Spy Kids and the two sequels in Robert Rodriguez’s first child-friendly franchise. A genre specialist, the filmmaker followed up the trilogy with the completion of another: Once Upon a Time in Mexico.
